contents.title: How to be more carbon aware

component.h2: How to be more carbon aware

component.p: Carbon intensity is lower when more energy comes from lower-carbon sources and higher when it comes from higher-carbon sources.
As we learnt earlier, if we are working in a carbon aware way, we need to do more work when the energy is coming from renewables, green or clean energy sources.

Iceland generates over 99% of its electricity from renewable sources, namely hydroelectricity (approximately 80%) and geothermal (approximately 20%). Iceland has a carbon intensity of 28g (Carbon Intensity gCOâ‚‚eq/kWh)
